The images were captured by Tyler Stolti: an employee at the club, and were later shared on the golf club's Facebook page.
Stolting: who witnessed the alligator while driving by the club's 17th tee, confirmed the authenticity of the photographs and stated that he had never seen an alligator this large before.
The presence of large alligators on golf: as evidenced by a similar incident in 2016 at the Buffalo Creek Golf Club in Palmetto, Florida.
